title: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available
description: Bug 2529 - The Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project menu item is not showing.
OB: When both P1 and P2 projects are selected, the Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project menu item is missing.
EB: When both P1 and P2 projects are selected, both the Open Project and Close Project menu items should be available.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create two projects, P1 and P2.
2. Select P2 project.
3. Attempt to close the selected project.
